about.title: About
about.subtitle: Empowering cryptocurrency traders with AI-driven insights and analytics

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: Cryptalyst.ai is dedicated to democratizing access to professional-grade cryptocurrency analysis tools. We believe that everyone should have access to the same powerful AI-driven insights that institutional investors use to make informed trading decisions.

technology.title: Our Technology
technology.content: Our platform leverages cutting-edge machine learning algorithms and natural language processing to analyze market trends, news sentiment, and trading patterns. We process millions of data points in real-time to provide you with actionable insights.

aiPowered.title: AI-Powered Analysis
aiPowered.description: Advanced algorithms that learn from market patterns to provide predictive insights
